channel.title: Hawk error
channel.description:
During my Pvp with StubernSnake and his pal Mohamed349 I saw them make a wall outside my cottage. Not that big of a deal, but what was odd was when I hawked it it came up with no results.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Zb4E4.png[/img]
Is there a way that hawk cant see them? This should be looked in to

item.title: Hawk error
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

I could have sworn that I saw them lay it down. And Id think I would have seen that wall if it was weeks old, but who knows.
I also have a chests with items gone but not showing anyone accessing it. Not a big concern but just odd.

Read full topic

item.title: Hawk error
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

That shouldn’t be possible, but hawk is running and recording things, I just tested it on myself.

Are you sure it wasn’t too old?

Read full topic
